com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib
Class WeatherConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherConfig

public class WeatherConfig
extends java.lang.Object

Weather configuration class. It is used to pass some configuration parameters to the weather provider. Some attributes of this class can be ignored for some weather provider implementation.

Author:
Francesco Azzola
